manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Infused with powerful essential oils Keeps Mosquitos Away Naturally Cliganic Mosquito Repellent Bracelets are powered by citronella, geranium, and lemongrass essential oils, which keep mosquitoes away naturally without the use of chemicals like DEET or registered pesticides.
For Kids and Adults, Alike One-size-fits-all Cliganic Mosquito Repellent Bracelets are stretchy, fit all sizes and ages, and can be worn on your wrist or ankle comfortably.

Long-Lasting Protection Individually Wrapped and Resealable You can use Cliganic Mosquito Repellent Bracelets more than once! Since our bracelets are individually wrapped and resealable, you can extend their lifespan by putting them back in the package after each use.

Cliganic Mosquito Repellent Bracelets Say goodbye to mosquitoes. Say hello to your next outdoor adventure. With long-lasting protection, Cliganic Mosquito Repellent bracelets are perfect for picnics, camping, hiking, and more!

Directions For Use It's so simple... Each bracelet can be worn up to a total of 4 hours. The bracelets can be reused by simply returning them into their resealable bags, please make sure that they are properly sealed.

For The Adventurer... Try the rest of our collection! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my trip to Mo'orea. I was looking for a deet free more environmentally friendly bug repellent. We went into the jungles a lot & let me tell you.. the mosquitoes are big & annoying! This product in combination to the Repel Plant-Based Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent Spray - its a win win! I barely had any bites & if I did I would spray the bite w/ the repel spray - no itching was involved!! Some people had massive welts from the mosquito bites & am I thankful there was multi pack because people were asking for them. I was there for 10 days & wore on both my ankles.. I changed them the moment the scent (very light) was not able to be smelled which on average was 3-4 days. Its not perfect but I was soooo happy I bought this so I am not going to take stars away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wore these in Costa Rica and they worked great!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to slip on when mosquitoes were around. Kept me from getting bit and they were easy to reuse. Just store in the closed pouch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mosquitos don’t get close to my legs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure if it really works
reviews.reviewText: But you will get a nice scent with you. I’m kind of regretting putting those chemicals over my skin. Not sure if this really works against mosquitoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No bug bites!
reviews.reviewText: Wore in Belize and no bug bites! Also no weird smell which was a plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kept mosquitos away
reviews.reviewText: Kept mosquitos away, safe for kids, not to mention once in the water us girls used it as hair bands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took this to Mexcio - LIFESAVER
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Cliganic 10 Pack Mosquito Repellent Bracelets, and I'm impressed with the results. These bracelets are a game-changer for outdoor activities. The variety of vibrant colors and comfortable design make them a stylish and practical accessory.What sets these bracelets apart is their effectiveness. Infused with natural oils, they provide a reliable shield against mosquitoes without the need for sticky lotions or sprays. I appreciate the long-lasting protection, making them perfect for camping, hiking, or any outdoor adventure.The fact that they are DEET-free is a significant plus for those who prefer a more natural approach to mosquito prevention. Each bracelet lasts for several days, and the 10-pack ensures I have more than enough for a season of outdoor fun.Overall, the Cliganic Mosquito Repellent Bracelets offer a convenient and efficient solution to keep pesky mosquitoes at bay. They're a must-have for anyone who enjoys spending time outdoors without the nuisance of bites. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works so far but
reviews.reviewText: I live in the Caribbean where mosquitoes are abundant. So far the product seems to work, however I was not impressed with the packaging. It’s as if someone opened it before it got to me. I am not sure if this is the fault of the manufacturer or of the shipping company. It is something that I suggest be investigated as some buyers might blame the company for things like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 7, 2018

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn't know we had them on!
reviews.reviewText: Always hard to determine if these devices work - we never had any issues with insect bites - in Fiji, so as insurance highly recommended.
I like how they are individually wrapped

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 21, 2018
reviews.reviewText: excellent for me and kids - only 4 stars coz the last ones i got had smiley stickers as well which were really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: I still got bitten when wearing bracelet.
reviews.reviewText: I had a few days holiday with family, to rural Suffolk, I bought these bracelets for us all, to deter the mosquitoes. We all got bitten several times on our first night out, so I don't think they made very much difference.
